title: Forever 21, Teen-Focused Retailer, Files for Bankruptcy
text:
Fast fashion retailer Forever 21 Inc. filed for bankruptcy protection on Sunday and said it planned to close hundreds of stores, the latest casualty of shifting shopping habits.

The closely held company, which has 800 stores world-wide, had been facing a cash crunch and preparing for a bankruptcy filing, The Wall Street Journal reported recently. The chain has lined up $350 million in bankruptcy financing to fund its restructuring, according to papers filed in U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del.

...
description: Fast fashion retailer Forever 21 filed for bankruptcy protection and said it planned to close hundreds of stores, the latest casualty of shifting shopping habits.
